title: When your main got banned/picked first, and you need to choose someone else.
body:
https://media.giphy.com/media/LnKa2WLkd6eAM/giphy.gif
Eventually, you just click someone so you don't get kicked.

replies.body:
This is why I have Olaf.

You tlit me in champ select I'll take rage man and run you down like a dog.

http://i.imgur.com/12GiL.gif?noredirect
http://rs1149.pbsrc.com/albums/o594/zzbbswife/Seems%20Legit/tumblr_m2qjcz5PzY1qe2c25_zpscbc7e09a.gif~c200

Garen is a better choice for that. See, if someone picks your pick intent, and you then pick Garen instead, that enemy is the villain %100 of the time


Trust me, I'm a scienceman

They can ban 6 of them, and then the enemy can first pick the 7th. 
http://67.media.tumblr.com/a687c2f9b850ba7359ef2984344ee5d1/tumblr_inline_oa9wrz9AtT1r4iqdh_540.gif

You need 16 mains per role... just to be sure.

> That moment both teams go troll-all-adc, ban-all-adc, and I'm last pick, and my main role is adc.
> ... \*sniffle\*
is there even 16 legitimate ADC in League of Legends?
Take Mordekaiser the only true ADC
I think you finally solved the longlasting question of "Who's the tank on an all adc team?"
Isn't that Graves though? He's a flipping drain tank with stacking resists.
That time I played Graves, who I don't know how to play, and won 3 1v1s in a row against Fiora...
He's more of an APC rather than ADC.
wheres kennen

oh wow, you responded fast
and i was only half joking. i know adc kennen ain't the best.
*though I do wanna try adc on-hit kennen*

Thanks anyway. Appreciated.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

and i just noticed most of the champs are different. tunnel vision much.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Wow, my team are jerks in this scenario.
I main {{champion:30}} so I don't run into this problem... um... ever.
What about when the one other karthus main picks him before you :o
Then I pick Kayle and kick his sorry ass for stealing my champ.
but what happens if hes better than you :o
I cry

Can't wait for those Gangplank {{champion:41}} nerfs to get live...
^ That happens way too often :<

It was, but now GP is building it for the free 20% cdr

Question is, if I were to play ranked and picked {{champion:17}} first, would you consider troll or tilted?

Because I don't play ranked so I don't be judged by either.
In ranked, no matter what you do you are a troll, and you lost because you "tilted" your team. Ranked *really* sucks lol.
Ah, then doesn't matter if I play Teemo or not. Good to know. Glad I don't play ranked again.

Idk, every teemo I've played with lately has been great. 

they tilted there opponent, then led 4 people on a merry chase around the map as we snuck baron.

Kinda reassures me, even if for half the wrong reasons.

Been watching 4 different Teemo only streamers. One's on the toxic path, but I watch him out of pity, because I'm the only viewer, another is fun to watch, even if he's having issues climbing, another two are pros, one that mains jungle Teemo, another that mains On hit Teemo.

Those 4 are pretty much making me think if Teemo's popularity is either getting better or worse, I still hope for the best as a hero and not as a monster.
I main 2 adc's in ranked. {{champion:96}} , and if I cant pick him, {{champion:6}} .

http://www.nerdargufy.com/uploads/2/6/1/4/26144516/184783.jpg?369
I'll be like : You take my  goat{{champion:16}}  prepare to suffer{{champion:25}}

When you ask politely for someone not to ban your champion, and they decide to ban them anyway, not for some strategic pick concerns against the enemy team, but because you won't trade roles you are in no way obligated to.

My response: pick Aatrox, and take whatever role they take. I know it shouldn't have to be noted, but if I have to... I WILL PROVE BEYOND A REASONABLE DOUBT THAT I AM THE ONLY PERSON IN CONTROL OF WHAT I DO IN A MATCH. SO STOP ELECTING YOURSELVES PRESIDENTS OF YOUR LEAGUE TEAM IN MATCHES PEOPLE. THAT'S NOT A THING.

I consider suggestions. I punish commands.

Curse the Koreans making {{champion:41}} popular again

Alright, time to bring back {{champion:122}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:48}}{{champion:24}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:83}}
Curse Tobias Fate*
I dont think so buddy.

TOBITO FLAPACHINI!

Dude, Tobias' stream grew so insanely fast o.o
I started watching him when he had like 20 viewers, and look where he is now!
I main Galio with my secondary being Jayce. This never happens.
Real mains dodge :p

Zac hasn't become P/B, but whenever i watchf foxdrop,phylol or redmercy, i always see him in the background
and it gives me this terrible chill.. {{champion:154}}

happened twice to me yesterday 

goes top intents Yasuo...enemy bans...ok intents Shen enemy picks.... locks in Yorick
then 
goes jungle intents Twitch...adc takes twitch I dont realize until i pick...panic picks singed jung... which worked oddly enough xd
Doesn't usually happen but when someone bans {{champion:98}} I cry.

I don't know about anyone else here, but as someone who mains a champion I know just about every little detail about them, including their strengths and more importantly their weaknesses.  I may be disappointed if the enemy picks my main, but they are unknowingly handing me a free lane phase.

They take my champ, I take their nexus.  It's an even trade.
This is why I have 5 mains, that is if I can even call them that with there being 5 of them.
